name: Planetary Defender (itch) (isyx)
description:
AN ENDLESS TWIN-STICK SPACE SHOOTER w COOP!

Communications are down....Can't get through to planet HQ.....!?!?!?!?!?…..The GEOMETROIDS are coming!

Launching from your top secret UFO flight training facility, you attempt to halt the alien advance and protect your planet!

How long can you hold them off? The GEOMETROIDS are relentless in their crusade to geometrize the entire known universe. Will you go down in the annals as the planet's greatest defender? We'll soon find out!

The GEOMETROIDS are HERE!

***A GAMEPAD IS RECOMMENDED FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE***

Music Credits: Intro and level5 by Jan125 https://opengameart.org/users/jan125 

 Sound Effects Credits: Kenny.nl https://opengameart.org/users/kenney
